sin⁡x\sin xsinx

∫0πsin⁡nxdx=∫0π2sin⁡nxdx+∫π2πsin⁡nxdx∵∫π2πsin⁡nxdx=t=x−π2x=t+π2∫0π2sin⁡n(t+π2)dt=∫0π2cos⁡nxdx∴∫0πsin⁡nxdx=∫0π2sin⁡nxdx+∫0π2cos⁡nxdx=2In\int_{0}^{\pi} \sin^n x \mathrm{d} x = \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin^n x \mathrm{d} x + \int_{\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\pi} \sin^n x \mathrm{d} x \\ \because \int_{\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\pi} \sin^n x \mathrm{d} x \underset{x = t + \frac{\pi}{2}} {\overset{t = x - \frac{\pi}{2}}{=}} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin^n (t + \frac{\pi}{2}) \mathrm{d} t = \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos^n x \mathrm{d} x \\ \therefore \int_{0}^{\pi} \sin^n x \mathrm{d} x = \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin^n x \mathrm{d} x + \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos^n x \mathrm{d} x = 2I_n ∫0π​sinnxdx=∫02π​​sinnxdx+∫2π​π​sinnxdx∵∫2π​π​sinnxdxx=t+2π​=t=x−2π​​∫02π​​sinn(t+2π​)dt=∫02π​​cosnxdx∴∫0π​sinnxdx=∫02π​​sinnxdx+∫02π​​cosnxdx=2In​

cos⁡x\cos xcosx

∫0πcos⁡nxdx=In+∫π2πcos⁡nxdx∵∫π2πcos⁡nxdx=t=x−π2x=t+π2∫0π2cos⁡n(t+π2)dt=∫0π2(−sin⁡x)ndx={∫0π2(sin⁡x)ndxn偶∫0π2−(sin⁡x)ndxn奇∴∫0πcos⁡nxdx={2Inn偶0n奇\int_{0}^{\pi} \cos^nx \mathrm{d} x = I_n + \int_{\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\pi} \cos^nx \mathrm{d} x \\ \because \int_{\frac{\pi}{2}}^{\pi} \cos^n x \mathrm{d} x \underset{x = t + \frac{\pi}{2}} {\overset{t = x - \frac{\pi}{2}}{=}} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos^n (t + \frac{\pi}{2}) \mathrm{d} t = \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} (-\sin x)^n \mathrm{d} x = \begin{cases} \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} (\sin x)^n \mathrm{d} x & n 偶 \\ \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} -(\sin x)^n \mathrm{d} x & n 奇 \end{cases} \\ \therefore \int_{0}^{\pi} \cos^nx \mathrm{d} x = \begin{cases} 2I_n & n 偶 \\ 0 & n 奇 \end{cases} ∫0π​cosnxdx=In​+∫2π​π​cosnxdx∵∫2π​π​cosnxdxx=t+2π​=t=x−2π​​∫02π​​cosn(t+2π​)dt=∫02π​​(−sinx)ndx={∫02π​​(sinx)ndx∫02π​​−(sinx)ndx​n偶n奇​∴∫0π​cosnxdx={2In​0​n偶n奇​

∫02πsin⁡nxdx=∫0πsin⁡nxdx+∫π2πsin⁡nxdx∫π2πsin⁡nxdx=t=x−πx=t+π∫0πsin⁡n(t+π)dt=∫0π(−sin⁡x)ndx⇒∫02πcos⁡nxdx=∫02πsin⁡nxdx={4Inn偶0n奇\int_{0}^{2\pi} \sin^n x \mathrm{d} x = \int_{0}^{\pi} \sin^n x \mathrm{d} x + \int_{\pi}^{2\pi} \sin^n x \mathrm{d} x \\ \int_{\pi}^{2\pi} \sin^n x \mathrm{d} x \underset{x = t + \pi} {\overset{t = x - \pi}{=}} \int_{0}^{\pi} \sin^n (t + \pi) \mathrm{d} t = \int_{0}^{\pi} (-\sin x)^n \mathrm{d} x \\ \Rightarrow \int_{0}^{2\pi} \cos^n x \mathrm{d} x = \int_{0}^{2\pi} \sin^n x \mathrm{d} x = \begin{cases} 4I_n & n 偶 \\ 0 & n 奇 \end{cases} ∫02π​sinnxdx=∫0π​sinnxdx+∫π2π​sinnxdx∫π2π​sinnxdxx=t+π=t=x−π​∫0π​sinn(t+π)dt=∫0π​(−sinx)ndx⇒∫02π​cosnxdx=∫02π​sinnxdx={4In​0​n偶n奇​

面积法

椭圆

x2a2+y2b2=1,S=πab\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1,S=\pi ab a2x2​+b2y2​=1,S=πab

曲线下方面积

y=x2y = x^2y=x2
y=exy = e^xy=ex
y=sin⁡xy = \sin xy=sinx
y=tan⁡xy = \tan xy=tanx
y=arctan⁡xy = \arctan xy=arctanx

∫01arctan⁡xdx=π4−∫0π4tan⁡xdx=π4−ln⁡22\int_{0}^{1} \arctan x \mathrm{d} x = \frac{\pi}{4} - \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \tan x \mathrm{d} x = \frac{\pi}{4} - \frac{\ln 2}{2} ∫01​arctanxdx=4π​−∫04π​​tanxdx=4π​−2ln2​

例子

x∈[a,b],∣f(x)∣≤π,f′(x)≥m>0⇒∣∫absin⁡f(x)dx∣≤2mx \in [a, b], |f(x)| \le \pi, f'(x) \ge m > 0 \Rightarrow \left | \int_{a}^{b} \sin f(x) \mathrm{d} x \right | \le \frac{2}{m} x∈[a,b],∣f(x)∣≤π,f′(x)≥m>0⇒​∫ab​sinf(x)dx​≤m2​

∣∫absin⁡f(x)dx∣=∣∫f(a)f(b)sin⁡y1f′(x)dy∣≤=1m∣∫f(a)f(b)sin⁡ydy∣−π≤f(a),f(b)≤π⇒∣∫f(a)f(b)sin⁡ydy∣≤∣∫0πsin⁡ydy∣=2\left | \int_{a}^{b} \sin f(x) \mathrm{d} x \right | = \left | \int_{f(a)}^{f(b)} \sin y \frac{1}{f'(x)} \mathrm{d} y \right | \le = \frac{1}{m} \left | \int_{f(a)}^{f(b)} \sin y \mathrm{d} y \right | \\ -\pi \le f(a), f(b) \le \pi \Rightarrow \left | \int_{f(a)}^{f(b)} \sin y \mathrm{d} y \right | \le \left | \int_{0}^{\pi} \sin y \mathrm{d} y \right | = 2 ​∫ab​sinf(x)dx​=​∫f(a)f(b)​sinyf′(x)1​dy​≤=m1​​∫f(a)f(b)​sinydy​−π≤f(a),f(b)≤π⇒​∫f(a)f(b)​sinydy​≤​∫0π​sinydy​=2

∴∣∫absin⁡f(x)dx∣≤2m\therefore \left | \int_{a}^{b} \sin f(x) \mathrm{d} x \right | \le \frac{2}{m} ∴​∫ab​sinf(x)dx​≤m2​
